product_meta.title: Elite Sports Boxing Mitts for Muay Thai MMA Sparring Training Punching Focus Punch Target Mitts and Pads
feature_bullets: LONG LASTING - Made from durable ultra-lightweight PU leather, your Essential Curved Punching Mitts are easy to maintain and clean. You’ll be amazed at how long they last.
INCREASE STRIKING PRECISION, POWER, & SPEED - The pre-curved concave technology offers you a superior striking surface every time because the mitts follow the natural curve of the hand.
PUSH YOUR BOUNDARIES - High-density impact protection & shock absorbent foam will provide both fighter and trainer with outstanding hand and wrist protection.

MAXIMUM COMFORT - Adjustable hook & loop Velcro straps allow you to achieve an ideal fit no matter your hand size. Mesh panels also give you great ventilation, keeping your hands cool & dry at all times.
UNISEX & VERSATILE - Your Essential Curved Punching Mitts excel in Boxing, Kickboxing, MMA, & Muay Thai. These gloves are great for both sexes ages 18 through 55 because of their unique design.
